description: A comprehensive set of extensions methods to complement Cuemon .NET Framework.
releaseNotes:
This release contains some complimentary extension methods and removal of existing extensions.
The following work was completed for this release:

- New extensions for IEnumerable{T}: RandomOrDefault{T}

- Removed the HasCircularReference extension due to noise; please use the ReflectionUtility.HasCircularReference<T> in the Cuemon.Reflection namespace instead
- Removed the ChangeType extension due to noise; please use the ConvertUtility.ChangeType in the Cuemon namespace instead
- Removed the HasXmlSerializationAttributes extension due to noise; please use the XmlSerializationUtility.ContainsXmlSerializationAttributes in the Cuemon.Xml.Serialization namespace instead
- Removed the WhileIsNotNull extension due to noise; please use the HierarchyUtility.WhileSourceTraversalIsNotNull in the Cuemon namespace instead
- Removed the WhileSequenceHasElements extension due to noise; please use the HierarchyUtility.WhileSourceTraversalHasElements in the Cuemon namespace instead
summary: A free and flexible assembly package, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possibilities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers and the likes thereof.
title: Cuemon .NET Framework Extensions
